description: Exports of crude oil from the U.S. Gulf Coast could hit a record 3.3 million barrels per day (bpd) this quarter, analysts said on Monday, as Europe chases U.S. crude to offset sanctioned Russian oil.
title: U.S. Gulf Coast crude oil exports to touch record high this quarter - Reuters
content: HOUSTON, June 27 (Reuters) - Exports of crude oil from the U.S. Gulf Coast could hit a record 3.3 million barrels per day (bpd) this quarter, analysts said on Monday, as Europe chases U.S. crude to o… [+2025 chars]

description: Norwegian offshore workers will likely go on strike on Tuesday in a stoppage that will cut oil and gas output as the negotiating parties have not made progress, the union and the lobby representing oil companies said on Monday.
title: Norway oil and gas workers to strike on Tuesday, cutting output - Reuters
content: OSLO, July 4 (Reuters) - Norwegian offshore workers will likely go on strike on Tuesday in a stoppage that will cut oil and gas output as the negotiating parties have not made progress, the union and… [+2724 chars]

title: Ukrainian president Zelenskiy accuses Vitol over ‘Russian blood oil’
content:
Ukrainian president Volodymyr Zelenskiy has called on the worlds largest independent oil trader to stop shipping Russian oil, accusing it of brazen profiteering from blood oil.
